name: Reality Reflection Inc.
description: Developer of a virtual reality software designed to build lifelike 3D models in a detailed resolution. The company's software provides immersion and reality with a level of full high-definition to create virtual reality games, photo-realistic characters, high-fidelity facial animations, and interactive content for its clients, enabling gaming companies to use it in various computer games and multimedia products.
one_liner: Developer of a virtual reality software designed to build lifelike 3D models in a detailed resolution. The company's software provides immersion and reality with a level of full high-definition to create virtual reality games, photo-realistic characters, high-fidelity facial animations, and interactive content for its clients, enabling gaming companies to use it in various computer games and multimedia products.
